forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain this morning...then a chance of an isolated thunderstorm in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 13C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady, heavy rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. Thunder possible. High 56F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of rain late. Low 7C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of rain late. Low near 45F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thunderstorms. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thunderstorms. High 56F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Thunder possible. Low near 5C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Thunder possible. Low 41F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 12C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 54F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low near 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 41F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 13C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 59F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 61F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.
